bio.description: Bharath Arappali is a visual designer and Illustrator based in Milan, Italy.
bio.focus:
His focus is at the intersection of visual identity and illustration, with a love for vibrant colors, organic textures, and natural elements.

Currently, he's trying for ways to integrate Motion Graphics and creative coding into the workflow aiming to expand the boundaries of visual design.

Outside of work, you can find him playing table tennis, enjoying music, laughing at memes and mindlessly surfing the internet admiring the work of fellow creatives.
